label: A108B24C11D24_cP334_222_h4i_i_bf_i-001
title: 'Ti$_{6}$F$_{27}$(H$_{3}$O)$_{3}$' [F$_{108}$H$_{24}$O$_{11}$Ti$_{24}$] Structure
comments:
The original data for this was published in CCDC entry 1586182. 
 The data was taken at 150K. 
 Although (Shylyapnikov, 2018) call this structure Ti$_{6}$F$_{27}$(H$_{3}$O)$_{3}$, this ignores the oxygen atoms on the (6b) sites, which are not associated with any hydrogen atoms.  If we wish to include these in a the form favored by this paper, the composition is better listed as O$_{3}$[Ti$_{6}$F$_{27}$(H$_{3}$O)$_{3}$]$_{2}$. 
 (Shylyapnikov, 2018) state that ``Hydrogen atoms in the structures of [H$_{3}$O]$_{3}$[Ti$_{6}$F$_{27}$] \dots were placed on ideal positions and refined as riding atoms with relative isotropic displacement parameters.''  This places the hydrogen atoms 0.91{\AA} from the associated oxygen.
